Comment: Regardless of whether one likes or dislikes the policies and practices of China, the fact is that The People’s Republic of China treat foreign relations and diplomacy as an exact science. Their brightest and most experienced minds vet strategies through committees of the Communist Party weighing the political, economic and military aspects of every position taken. Compare that to the totally ad hoc and whimsical “strategy” of the Donald Trump administration and it’s not hard to see who will prevail.
